snippet.title: Zelda II - Amida's Curse Release Trailer (NES Rom Hack)
snippet.description:
Download the game now at: https://www.romhacking.net/hacks/6292/
Stay up-to-date on my game dev projects at: https://www.okimpala.net/
Follow me on Twitter: https://twitter.com/OkImpala
Listen to the original soundtrack on Bandcamp: https://eatabrick.bandcamp.com/album/amidas-curse
You can also find the soundtrack on Spotify: https://open.spotify.com/album/5XA6eVX9jtkxEe8XbiXBu9?si=c71aa8381ca94cc8

Zelda II - Amida's Curse is a Zelda II Rom Hack created by Ok Impala!

One day Link finds a portal to a strange land. Curious he starts exploring the magical world of Amida. Little does he know, that he's on a brand new adventure that will take him to places he couldn't have imagined. Amida has a deep emotional link to our hero. Can Link unravel the secrets of Amida and return to his own world?

Trailer music by Jeremiah Sun

#ZeldaII #Zelda2 #Zelda #Romhack #Romhacking #AmidasCurse
